title: ZipRecruiter CEO Says Coronavirus Could Impact Hiring
itunes:title: ZipRecruiter CEO Says Coronavirus Could Impact Hiring
description:
Ian Siegel, CEO of ZipRecruiter, discusses how the `resilient' labor market could feel the effects of the coronavirus, as companies consider changing their hiring practices. He also shares the firm's "Future of Work" study looking at how technology is changing employment.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
